description.value:
As the first action of each of your turns, you can use a free action to mark each enemy adjacent to you until the start of your next turn. If you supersede this mark with another one on an enemy, that enemy takes a -5 penalty to attack rolls for any attack that doesn't include you as a target, instead of a -2 penalty, until the second mark ends.

Published in Primal Power, page(s) 153.
